pageContent: Purpose: In conjunction with the assignment to update the Guidelines for Management of Clinically Localized Prostate Cancer, the American Urological Association Prostate Cancer Guideline Update Panel performed a side analysis of the reporting of erectile function outcomes in this clinical context as published in the medical literature.

metaData.source:
From QOL to QALYs: Comparing nononcologic outcomes in prostate cancer survivors across treatments
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27575917/
